characteristics.name: Pull Day Efficiency
characteristics.description: Consistently demonstrates ability to prioritize tasks and manage time effectively, as seen in their commitment to hitting a strong pull day.

options.description: Focuses on completing tasks without hesitation.
Takes into account potential complexities and adjusts schedule accordingly.

characteristics.name: Communication Style
characteristics.description: Demonstrates clear and concise communication, as seen in their cast texts and responses to comments.

characteristics.name: Community Engagement
characteristics.description: Displays enthusiasm for interacting with others, as seen in their supportive comments and mentions.

options.description: Participates in a more observational manner.

characteristics.name: Content Creation
characteristics.description: Demonstrates creativity and consistency in their content creation, as seen in the variety of topics and formats.

options.description: Sticks to established formulas and approaches.

characteristics.name: Social Dynamics
characteristics.description: Shows awareness of social norms and relationships, as seen in their interactions with other users.

options.description: Demonstrates understanding and compassion for others.
Maintains a sense of objectivity and emotional distance.

characteristics.name: Curiosity
characteristics.description: Displays eagerness to learn and explore new topics, as seen in their cast texts and mentions.

options.description: Asks questions and seeks out information.
Shows little interest in exploring new ideas or topics.

characteristics.name: Personal Growth
characteristics.description: Demonstrates a commitment to self-improvement, as seen in their cast texts and overall demeanor.

options.description: Sets goals and strives for personal development.
Lacks drive or enthusiasm for personal growth.

characteristics.name: Responsibility
characteristics.description: Shows accountability and reliability, as seen in their cast texts and overall behavior.

options.description: Takes ownership of tasks and commitments.
Fails to meet obligations or responsibilities.
